title: rank brozne
body:
hard, fuking noob teammates, and the system is so noob. after you win in a row, all the afks and unskilled begin to come to your team. 

uninstalled fuking noob game.

replies.body: Rather then focusing on your teammates mistakes, figure out what you can do better, one carrying teammate can make a large difference, including but not limited to fully carrying the game by 1v5ing, keeping your team in the game long enough for your teammates to catch up and making their enemy laner ragequit.

> [{quoted}](name=Dezzter,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=6EeKGElY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-05T11:53:23.327+0000)
>
> Rather then focusing on your teammates mistakes, figure out what you can do better, one carrying teammate can make a large difference, including but not limited to fully carrying the game by 1v5ing, keeping your team in the game long enough for your teammates to catch up and making their enemy laner ragequit.

Pretty good advice there, made me get to silver.
